//è®¡ç®—sign
getSign(params) {
    var befor_sign = '20230329001620XXX'+this.data.inputText+'1435660288XXXXXXXXXXXXXX'
    var s = md5(befor_sign)
    this.setData({
        sign:s
    })
    console.log("signæ˜¯ï¼š"+this.data.sign)
}
